# datadog_security_monitoring_critical_assets (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve a list of all critical assets for the current org.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datadog_security_monitoring_critical_assets" "all" {
}

output "critical_assets_count" {
  value = length(data.datadog_security_monitoring_critical_assets.all.critical_assets)
}

output "critical_assets" {
  value = data.datadog_security_monitoring_critical_assets.all.critical_assets
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `critical_assets` (List of Object) List of critical assets (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--critical_assets))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--critical_assets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `critical_assets`

Read-Only:

- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `id` (String)
- `query` (String)
- `rule_query` (String)
- `severity` (String)
- `tags` (List of String)
